SelectAll: SELECT g.GoalKey, c.CategoryKey, c.CategoryName, a.AccountKey, a.AccountName, sc.SubcategoryName AS `GoalName`, sc.SubcategoryPrefix AS `GoalPrefix`, g.GoalAmount, g.EstimatedCompletionDate, g.LastUpdatedDate FROM dimGoal g INNER JOIN dimSubcategory sc ON g.GoalKey = sc.SubcategoryKey INNER JOIN dimCategory c ON sc.CategoryKey = c.CategoryKey INNER JOIN dimAccount a ON sc.AccountKey = a.AccountKey
GetRowWithKey: SELECT g.GoalKey, c.CategoryKey, c.CategoryName, a.AccountKey, a.AccountName, sc.SubcategoryName AS `GoalName`, sc.SubcategoryPrefix AS `GoalPrefix`, g.GoalAmount, g.EstimatedCompletionDate, g.LastUpdatedDate FROM dimGoal g INNER JOIN dimSubcategory sc ON g.GoalKey = sc.SubcategoryKey INNER JOIN dimCategory c ON sc.CategoryKey = c.CategoryKey INNER JOIN dimAccount a ON sc.AccountKey = a.AccountKey WHERE g.GoalKey = ?
